activities: Salesfusion provides software-as-a-service marketing software applications that are used by businesses within the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland for automated online marketing activities. Salesfusion acts only as a data processor with respect to personal information that it receives from its customers and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose information it receives. Such personal information consists mostly of business-related data such as name, title, company name, address, telephone number, or email address. Salesfusion also receives some personal information from its customers, prospective customers and business partners for its own sales and marketing activities and internal business operations. Salesfusion receives and stores information for customers who use the software in our primary EU datacenter which is hosted by Amazon Web Services and located in Ireland.
eucountries: Belgium, Finland, France, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, title, address, telephone number, email address, marketing activity
privacyprograms: Messaging Anti-Abuse Working Group (MAAWG); Email Sender and Provider Coalition (ESPC)
